\newcommand{\ottmetavars}{
\ottmetavartabular{

\newcommand{\otte}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{e}}{::=}{\ottcom{expressions}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{lit}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{literal}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{Vec} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{vector ctor}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{v}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{value}}}

\newcommand{\ottlit}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{lit}}{::=}{\ottcom{literals}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{num}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{integer}}}

\newcommand{\ottv}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{v}}{::=}{\ottcom{values}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottsym{[}  \ottnt{lit_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, .. \, \ottnt{lit_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{T}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{vector}}}

\newcommand{\ottT}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{T}}{::=}{\ottcom{types}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottkw{Int}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{integer}}}

\newcommand{\ottOperationalSemantics}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{OperationalSemantics}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{$\ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}$ reduces to $\ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}$}}}

\otte\ottinterrule

% defns OperationalSemantics
%% defn reduce
\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXLitCtor}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottmv{num}  \longrightarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{num}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{Int}}{%
{\ottdrulename{E\_LitCtor}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXVecCtor}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \longrightarrow  \ottmv{num_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \quad .. \quad \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \longrightarrow  \ottmv{num_{\ottmv{n}}}}%
}{
\ottkw{Vec} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  \longrightarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{num_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, .. \, \ottmv{num_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{Int}}{%
{\ottdrulename{E\_VecCtor}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnreduce}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}$}{\ottcom{$\ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}$ reduces to $\ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}$}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleEXXLitCtor{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleEXXVecCtor{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsOperationalSemantics}{
\ottdefnreduce{}}

\ottdefnsOperationalSemantics
}
